ChimeraTools (Page under construction. Features or links may not work correctly)

So what is this?

Currently, not much. It aims to be a one-stop-shop for info, guides, helpful tools, and more for the Survival\Open World\Crafting MMORPG Chimeraland.
Guides and tools are actively being created and updates to the site are expected multiple times a week.
Check back occasionally to see what updates are in store.



Fox is a self taught web developer and this is his first sizeable project. He handles criticism very well, so feedback, questions, thoughts, and comments are welcomed!

Anyone interested in contribution can contact Fox at varefox@gmail.com or on Discord as Fox-- #2568, or in game.

Pet/Attendant EXP Calculator

Never waste an EXP pill by knowing the exact amount of EXP
is needed for your mounts/attendants

Cookbook (canceled)

This was going to be an interactive cookbook app that displayed recipes in a paginated grid, allowing you
to build an ingredient list depending on which/how many recipes you wanted to craft!
I have accepted that it is outside my scope of knowledge at the moment and will return to it eventually.

Crafter's Daybook (coming soon)

Much like the recipe planner, the Crafter's Daybook will provide every crafting recipe. It will also include a list of materials to farm and eventually methods of obtaining each item.

Equipment BP Calculator (coming soon)

This tool provides calculations for all of the attributes that are available on gear.
Perfect if you're looking to min-max your BP rating, or just see what's out there..

Possibly will include:
Player Community Center - To make your voice be heard throughout the land, and to vote on or enter various competitions.


Player Trading Center
- An informal auction house of sorts where players can set up a trade.
